mapper.select: SELECT MV.MOVIE_NUMBER, MV.MOVIE_TITLE, MV.MOVIE_PRICE, MV.MOVIE_POSTER, MV.MOVIE_SUMMARY , MV.MOVIE_RUNTIME, MV.MOVIE_RELEASE_DATE FROM MEMBER M JOIN BASKET B ON M.MEMBER_NUMBER = B.MEMBER_NUMBER JOIN MOVIE MV ON B.MOVIE_NUMBER = MV.MOVIE_NUMBER WHERE M.MEMBER_NUMBER = #{memberNumber}

SELECT MV.MOVIE_NUMBER, MV.MOVIE_TITLE, MV.MOVIE_PRICE, MV.MOVIE_POSTER, MV.MOVIE_SUMMARY , MV.MOVIE_RUNTIME, MV.MOVIE_RELEASE_DATE FROM MEMBER M JOIN BASKET B ON M.MEMBER_NUMBER = B.MEMBER_NUMBER JOIN MOVIE MV ON B.MOVIE_NUMBER = MV.MOVIE_NUMBER WHERE MV.MOVIE_NUMBER = #{movieNumber}
mapper.insert: INSERT ALL INTO ORDER_HISTORY (order_history_number, order_history_time, member_number) VALUES(ORDER_HISTORY_NUMBER_SEQ.NEXTVAL, SYSDATE, #{memberNumber}) INTO ORDER_PRODUCT (order_product_number, order_history_number, movie_number) VALUES(ORDER_PRODUCT_NUMBER_SEQ.NEXTVAL, ORDER_HISTORY_NUMBER_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{movieNumber}) SELECT * FROM DUAL
mapper.select: SELECT OH.ORDER_HISTORY_NUMBER, M.MEMBER_ID, MV.MOVIE_TITLE, OH.ORDER_HISTORY_TIME FROM MEMBER M JOIN ORDER_HISTORY OH ON M.MEMBER_NUMBER = OH.MEMBER_NUMBER JOIN ORDER_PRODUCT OP ON OP.ORDER_HISTORY_NUMBER = OH.ORDER_HISTORY_NUMBER JOIN MOVIE MV ON OP.MOVIE_NUMBER = MV.MOVIE_NUMBER WHERE M.MEMBER_NUMBER = #{memberNumber}
